required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot Randomized Control Trial of Telehealth Group for Improving Peer Relationships (PEERS) in NF1
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of a Telehealth Group for Improving Peer Relationships for Adolescents With Neurofibromatosis Type 1

brief_summary.textblock: This is a pilot randomized control trial of the UCLA PEERS protocol delivered via Telehealth with teens with neurofibromatosis type 1 whose parents report that they have difficulty making and keeping friends.

primary_outcome.measure: Social Skills Improvement System - SEL (SSIS-SEL; Gresham & Elliot, 2017) Parent
primary_outcome.description: Change from pre- to post-test on SSIS-SEL parent Total Standard Score (measures social functioning)

primary_outcome.measure: Test of Adolescent Social SKills (TASSK: Laugeson & Frankel, 2010)
primary_outcome.time_frame: within four weeks of PEERS completion
primary_outcome.description: Change from pre- to post-test on total score (measures knowledge of the PEERS concepts)

primary_outcome.measure: Social Skills Improvement System - SEL (SSIS-SEL; Gresham & Elliot, 2017) Parent
primary_outcome.description: Change from pre- to 16 week followup on total score

primary_outcome.measure: Social Skills Improvement System - SEL (SSIS-SEL; Gresham & Elliot, 2017) Parent
primary_outcome.time_frame: within four weeks of PEERS completion for treatment group
primary_outcome.description: Amount of change from pre- to post-test differs from change in Wait List Control group

secondary_outcome.description: change from pre- to post-test on Total SRS-2 completed by caregivers (measure of social impairment)
change from pre- to 16 week followup on Total SRS-2 completed by caregivers (measure of social impairment)

secondary_outcome.measure: Social Skills Improvement System - SEL (SSIS-SEL; Gresham & Elliot, 2017) Teen
secondary_outcome.description: Change from pre- to post-test on teen self-report of social functioning

secondary_outcome.measure: Social Skills Improvement System - SEL (SSIS-SEL; Gresham & Elliot, 2017) Teen
secondary_outcome.description: Change from pre- to 16 week followup on teen self-report of social functioning

other_outcome.description: Change from pre- to post-test in parental ratings of QoL
Change from pre- to post-test in teen ratings of QoL

arm_group.description: PEERS weekly sessions - parallel teens and parent/caregiver groups
Offered intervention at a later date

intervention.description: Structured social skills curriculum including didactics, behavioral rehearsal, parent coaching, and parent coaching support.
intervention.other_name: Program for the Education and Enrichment of Relational Skills

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Physician diagnosis of neurofibromatosis type 1
- Age 12-17
- Main language spoken in the home is English
- Reliable internet access
- Current functional impairment in peer relationships
- Teen is interested and motivated to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- Main language spoken in the home is not English
- Cognitive or developmental difficulties that affect reading comprehension or understanding of treatment material
- Significant behavioral concerns
- Other comorbid medical conditions
- Major surgery in past 6 months
- Prior social skills group treatment within past 6 months
- Prior participation in PEERS

patient_data.ipd_description: Deidentified data will be available upon request to qualified investigators.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Available following publication of the research study.
